kariminf.langpi.basic

Interface BasicInfo

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArInfo, BgInfo, CaInfo, CsInfo, DeInfo, ElInfo, EnInfo, EsInfo, EuInfo, FaInfo, FiInfo, FrInfo, HeInfo, HiInfo, HuInfo, IdInfo, ItInfo, JaInfo, KoInfo, NlInfo, NnInfo, NoInfo, PtInfo, RoInfo, RuInfo, SvInfo, ThInfo, TrInfo, ZhInfo

    public interface BasicInfo
    Contains the informations about the preprocessed language

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String version 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getLangEnglishName()
      Returns the English name of the language, for example "Arabic".
      java.lang.String getLangName()
      Returns the original name of the language, for example: "العربية".

    • Field Detail

      • version

        static final java.lang.String version
        See Also:

      • getLangEnglishName

        java.lang.String getLangEnglishName()
        Returns the English name of the language, for example "Arabic".
        Returns:
        English name of the language

      • getLangName

        java.lang.String getLangName()
        Returns the original name of the language, for example: "العربية".
        Returns:
        language's name with the original alphabet
